data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account number.
data.meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics meter number.
data.unit_type_description: Select the unit type. 'CF' stands for Cubic Feet and 'G' stands for Gallons.
data.tier1_gallons_description: Enter the number of gallons for Tier 1. Leave blank if not applicable.
data.tier1_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 1 (e.g., 0.0128).
data.tier2_gallons_description: Enter the number of gallons for Tier 2. Leave blank if not applicable.
data.tier2_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 2 (e.g., 0.0150).
data.tier3_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 3 (e.g., 0.0175).
data.service_fee_description: Enter the fixed service fee amount (e.g., 15.00).

sensus_analytics_usage_unit.name: Usage Unit
sensus_analytics_usage_unit.description: Native Unit of measurement chosen by Sensus Analytics.

sensus_analytics_meter_address.name: Meter Address
sensus_analytics_meter_address.description: Street address of the water meter.

sensus_analytics_last_read.name: Last Read
sensus_analytics_last_read.description: Timestamp of the last meter reading.

sensus_analytics_meter_longitude.name: Meter Longitude
sensus_analytics_meter_longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_meter_id.name: Meter ID
sensus_analytics_meter_id.description: Unique identifier for the water meter.

sensus_analytics_meter_latitude.name: Meter Latitude
sensus_analytics_meter_latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_latest_read_usage.name: Latest Read Usage
sensus_analytics_latest_read_usage.description: Latest cumulative usage recorded by the meter.

sensus_analytics_billing_usage.name: Billing Usage
sensus_analytics_billing_usage.description: Total usage amount that has been billed.

sensus_analytics_billing_cost.name: Billing Cost
sensus_analytics_billing_cost.description: Total cost of the billed usage.

sensus_analytics_last_hour_usage.name: Last Hour Usage
sensus_analytics_last_hour_usage.description: Water usage for the last hour.

sensus_analytics_last_hour_timestamp.name: Last Hour Timestamp
sensus_analytics_last_hour_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.

sensus_analytics_meter_odometer.name: Meter Odometer
sensus_analytics_meter_odometer.description: Total cumulative usage recorded by the meter.

sensus_analytics_hourly_timestamp.name: Hourly Timestamp
sensus_analytics_hourly_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.
